name: Start Powerless
description:
Start Powerless is a platformer where you can’t do anything except move left/right until you pick up the powerups in each level.  This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 45.

Controls

Move left: Left Arrow / A

Move right: Right Arrow / D

Jump: Up Arrow / W / Z / Space

Restart: R

Back: Backspace

Mute: M
